sql-query.name: QueryUserList
sql-query.content:
select user_.*, case sex when 1 then '男' when 2 then '女' else 'ERR' end sex_text, org.code org_code, org.name org_name from base_user user_ left join base_data_rel rel on (rel.left_value= user_.id) left join base_org org on (rel.right_value=org.code and rel.right_type='ORG_CODE') where user_.tenant_id= #{tenantId}
and user_.is_deleted=0
